price: Na hata tukikuondoa, Sisi tutalipiza kisasi chetu kwao.
arabic: فَإِمَّا نَذۡهَبَنَّ بِكَ فَإِنَّا مِنۡهُم مُّنتَقِمُونَ
footnotes: Basi tukikushika tukakufisha kabla hatuja kuonyesha adhabu yao, na kifua chako kikatua kwa hayo, na pia vifua vya Waumini, alaa kulli hali, Sisi bila ya shaka tutawaadhibu duniani na Akhera.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-immā nadhhabanna bika fa-innā min'hum muntaqimūna
